text: Saturday Night and Sunday Morning is a 1960 British drama movie directed by first time directed by Karel Reisz and was based on the 1958 novel of the same name by Alan Sillitoe. It stars Albert Finney, Shirley Anne Field, Norman Rossington, Rachel Roberts, Bryan Pringle, Frank Pettitt, Avis Bunnage, Colin Blakely and won 4 BAFTA Awards in 1961. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1960 drama movies Category:British drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Karel Reisz
title: Saturday Night and Sunday Morning (movie)
